Name: Gayane
description:
Meet Gayane, a young farmer from Dashtadem Village, where she lives with her husband, 2 young children (ages 3 and 4), and her elderly grandmother. Agriculture has been her family's main activity for many years. The family owns a farm of cows, bulls, sheep, lambs, and piglets.

Thanks to the sales of agri-products, the family is able to make a living. However, due to the seasonality of agricultural activities, her husband often travels abroad to earn money.

Since farming needs constant enhancements and care, Gayane has applied for financial support. With the provided loan, she plans to purchase high-quality forage for her livestock. Gayane is sure that this will help to increase the farm's productivity and agri-business income. She is full of hope and will work hard to achieve her goals so her husband can come back to his family.
